roleset.name: insert names of famous people into conversation in order to seem more important

example.name: must be Los Angeles
example.text: But the truth is that almost everyone, from real-estate agents to city fathers, name-drops; and a surprising number of people have an ancient uncle who claims he lived next door to the cartoonist who did the Katzenjammer Kids.
example.arg: almost everyone, from real-estate agents to city fathers,

roleset.note: NAMEDROP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'name-drop' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from namedrop.01-v predicate notes)
